name: Forest Record 1.7
description:
_______________________________________________________

📜  This is the first web game i ever created, and also my first published game on itch.io

Status Released Platforms Windows, macOS, Linux, Android Author Pixel Dew Genre Platformer, Simulation Tags 8-Bit, Escape Game, Fantasy, Low-poly, Singleplayer

_______________________________________________________

❓  I made this game using Gdevelop 5 in 20 minutes (included export time), for my school project the deadline is 2h.

_______________________________________________________

💳  Things i used for this game (Credit):

+ Gdevelop5 Default Template (Just a simple remake version of original one)

+ A forest jpeg image (1920x1080) for BG

+ A background music from yt ("8 Bit Evil!" Royalty Free Halloween Music by HeatleyBros).

_______________________________________________________

🧪 Beta Tester (Free): Access to all-files

⭐ Supporter ($1.00): Access to early-build and beta version

🔥 Huge-Supporter ($5.00): Join Private Discord and will be in-game supporter list.

_______________________________________________________

🎮 HOW TO PLAY

A - Left

D - Right

Space - Jump

_______________________________________________________
